devdoc.author: Polylend, inspired by the Openzeppelin ERC20 implementation*

allowance(address,address).details: Returns the allowance of spender on the tokens owned by owner

params.spender: The user allowed to spend the owner's tokens

returns._0: The amount of owner's tokens spender is allowed to spend*

approve(address,uint256).details: Allows `spender` to spend the tokens owned by _msgSender()

params.spender: The user allowed to spend _msgSender() tokens

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Decreases the allowance of spender to spend _msgSender() tokens

params.spender: The user allowed to spend on behalf of _msgSender()
params.subtractedValue: The amount being subtracted to the allowance

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Increases the allowance of spender to spend _msgSender() tokens

params.addedValue: The amount being added to the allowance
params.spender: The user allowed to spend on behalf of _msgSender()

returns._0: The total supply of the token*

transfer(address,uint256).details: Executes a transfer of tokens from _msgSender() to recipient

params.amount: The amount of tokens being transferred

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Executes a transfer of token from sender to recipient, if _msgSender() is allowed to do so

params.amount: The amount of tokens being transferred
